name: Zombie Ragdoll Resistance
description:
Stop the zombie researchers from arming hordes of zombies! Empty all the guns and take some angry zombies down while you're at it!  Can you prevent disaster and escape with your life before it's too late?

Download Recommended for Best Experience

Controls:

Move: WASD or Left Stick

Attack: Space or RB

Credits:

Programmer/Artist/Game Designer

Pixelbrain

Composer/Sound Designer

Cyber Squib
